body.section: Hierarchy HealthRisk is a kind of HealthConcern

section.title: Description
section.p: "Risks may represent clinically significant potential concerns to the patient’s health. They are captured in order to monitor and mitigate the manifestation of a future concern. Risks may be raised based on clinical evidences or they may capture a provider’s judgment." - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model.

stentry.p: "Names or describes the risk" - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model.
"Date/time at which the risk is identified." - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model.
"A risk is clinically significant but the level may be low, medium or high depending on care team judgment." - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model.
"The date the risk is no longer a threat to the health of the patient. " - HL7 Care Plan Domain Analysis Model.
